definitions.definition: A craft used for transportation of goods, fishing, racing, recreational cruising, or military use on or in the water , propelled by oars or outboard motor or inboard motor or by wind .
A conveyance , utensil , or dish somewhat resembling a boat in shape.
examples: a stone boat ;   a gravy boat

definitions.definition: A large and heavy car ; the term connotes wasteful size .
examples: He claimed to be broke but he always drove that ridiculous boat .

definitions.definition: One of two possible conformations of cyclohexane rings (the other being chair ), shaped roughly like a boat.
The refugee boats arriving in Australian waters, and by extension, refugees generally.
In Conway’s Game of Life , a particular still life consisting of a dead cell surrounded by five living cells.

main_definition: A craft used for transportation of goods, fishing, racing, recreational cruising, or military use on or in the water , propelled by oars or outboard motor or inboard motor or by wind .
secondary_definitions: A conveyance , utensil , or dish somewhat resembling a boat in shape.
( informal ) A large and heavy car ; the term connotes wasteful size .
( organic chemistry , physical chemistry ) One of two possible conformations of cyclohexane rings (the other being chair ), shaped roughly like a boat.
( Australian politics , informal ) The refugee boats arriving in Australian waters, and by extension, refugees generally.
( cellular automata ) In Conway’s Game of Life , a particular still life consisting of a dead cell surrounded by five living cells.
